description:
A Lucifer Hawk demon.
He takes control over a Megadyne cyborg produced by http://anidb.net/ch25811 [Nagata Heavy Industries] in order to get http://anidb.net/ch13444 [Kiddy Phenyl] falsely accused of killing a civilian, critically injuring http://anidb.net/ch25721 [Ralph Bowmers] in the process.
name: Stoskeros
